item.title: Is DevOps Dead?
item.description: Introduction In 2015 the DevOps movement was gaining momentum. The DevOpsDays conferences were expanding around the world, from 22 events in 2015 to 42 the following year.

item.title: Bruce Lee. Lessons in Agile
item.description: You have been asked to start a new team that will be developing software.
